DataElement.preferredName: Patient Death Primary Disease or Disorder Reason Name
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the name related to primary disease as reason for patient death.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Death Primary Disease or Disorder Reason
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to primary disease as reason for patient death.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:The cessation of life.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring first in time or sequence; original. (American Heritage Dictionary):Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.:An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

Concepts.definition: Occurring first in time or sequence; original; of greatest rank or importance or value.

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.
An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the response criteria (includes RECIST and others) and associated documentation of disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: ACOSOG CRF:American College of Surgeons Oncology Group Case Report Form

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The words or language units by which a thing is known.
